title: chat text api functionality
description: Verify that the Chat Text API correctly handles text-based chat interactions including language detection, translation, natural language understanding, retrieval augmented generation, and response generation by the large language model.

title: chat voice api functionality
description: Verify that the Chat Voice API correctly processes voice input by transcribing audio and then processing the transcribed text through the Chat Text API to generate appropriate responses.

title: documents api operations
description: Verify that the Documents API correctly manages document-related operations such as uploading documents, listing available documents, and deleting documents.

title: admin api functionalities
description: Verify that the Admin API provides all administrative functionalities including analytics access, content management, feedback handling, and privacy-aware logging.
